```{r}
mx <-
  lmer(
    ple_cfa ~
      day + beep + gender + age +
      mss_neg_score * stressor_mean_centered_int + 

       (stressor_mean_centered_int | id_esm), data = model_dat)

summary(mx, type = "int")

mx_test <- 
  lm(ple_between ~ mss_dis_score, data = model_dat %>% select(id_esm, mss_dis_score, mss_neg_score, mss_pos_score, ple_between) %>% distinct())

summary(mx_test)
```


```{r}
plot_model(m3, type = "diag")
vif(m3)
```
